block.p: Greeshma Kenya Rai, a daughter of Dr. Veena Rai and Dr. Prem Rai of Windsor, Ontario, was married yesterday to Sanjay Kadandale Shetty, the son of Veena Shetty and Dr. Ravi Shetty of Manhasset, N.Y. Sri Chandrashekar Sharma officiated at the Hindu ceremony at the Bharatiya Temple in Troy, Mich.

Greeshma Kenya Rai, a daughter of Dr. Veena Rai and Dr. Prem Rai of Windsor, Ontario, was married yesterday to Sanjay Kadandale Shetty, the son of Veena Shetty and Dr. Ravi Shetty of Manhasset, N.Y. Sri Chandrashekar Sharma officiated at the Hindu ceremony at the Bharatiya Temple in Troy, Mich.

Mrs. Shetty, 24, will graduate from Albany Medical College on Thursday. Mr. Shetty, 26, will graduate from Harvard Medical School on June 8. Later in the month, they will begin residencies in Boston, she in internal medicine at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, and he in diagnostic radiology at Massachusetts General Hospital.
The bride graduated magna cum laude from Union College. Her father is a psychiatrist and her mother is a family physician, in Windsor.

The bridegroom graduated summa cum laude from Harvard University, from which he also received a master's degree in biology. His father is a neurologist in Amityville, N.Y., and his mother is the office manager for the practice.
